title: How to Get Lockpicks in Oblivion

steps.title: Find Shady Sam by the north wall of the imperial city.
steps.content: Find Shady Sam by the north wall of the imperial city. He sells 30 lockpicks and poisons.

steps.title: Go to the imperial city stables, and then start heading north along the walls.
steps.content: Go to the imperial city stables, and then start heading north along the walls.

steps.title: Keep an eye out for him right along the walls.
steps.content: Keep an eye out for him right along the walls. He sells the lockpicks for about 6 gold a piece.

steps.title: There are a couple of people that sell lockpicks.
steps.content: There are a couple of people that sell lockpicks.

steps.title: Armand Christophe sells them for 5 gold each.
steps.content: Armand Christophe sells them for 5 gold each.

steps.title: Go to the fencers, as they have a couple or a dozen lockpicks.
steps.content: Go to the fencers, as they have a couple or a dozen lockpicks.

steps.title: Wander outside of the cities looking for a fort or someplace you can raid.
steps.content: Wander outside of the cities looking for a fort or someplace you can raid. There are usually about 10-20 lockpicks in each dungeon, fort, ruin etc.
